House Bill/Resolution NO. HB09047
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR A THREE THOUSAND PESO INCREASE ACROSS THE BOARD IN THE MONTHLY PENSION OF WAR VETERANS AND THEIR DEPENDENTS, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Intends to enhance the benefits granted in Republic Act No.11164 which raised the monthly pension of war veterans. Proposes a provision on the rules of succession for the beneficiaries of the pension wherein the spouse or the eldest legitimate child shall be allowed to receive the pension upon death of the war veteran.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VILLAFUERTE, LUIS RAYMUND JR. F.
DATE FILED : 2019-02-06
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
